# rutils

## Overview

`rutils` is an R package that I (Daniel Vartanian) use to store and
organize my utility functions until they are ready to be moved to their
own package.

This package is primarily intended for personal use, but you are welcome
to use it if you find it helpful. Please note that not all functions are
exported or documented. Access the source code to see them all.

> If you find this project useful, please consider giving it a star! Â 
> [![GitHub repo
> stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/danielvartan/rutils.png)](https://github.com/danielvartan/rutils/)

## Installation

You can install `rutils` using the
[`remotes`](https://github.com/r-lib/remotes) package:

``` r
remotes::install_github("danielvartan/rutils")
```

# Package index

## Conditionals

- [`swap_if()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/swap_if.md)
  : Swap two values if a condition is met

## Colors

- [`col2hex()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/col2hex.md)
  : Convert a color name to hexadecimal format

## Dialogs

- [`shush()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/shush.md)
  : Suppress messages and warnings

## Files

- [`download_file()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/download_file.md)
  : Download files from the internet to a local directory
- [`get_file_ext()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/get_file_ext.md)
  : Get file extensions
- [`get_file_name_without_ext()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/get_file_name_without_ext.md)
  : Get file names without the extension
- [`get_file_size()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/get_file_size.md)
  : Get the sizes of local files or files from URLs

## Images

- [`qr_code()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/qr_code.md)
  : Generate a QR code

## Replacement

- [`list_replace_all()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/list_replace_all.md)
  : Replace matches in a list
- [`vct_replace_all()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/vct_replace_all.md)
  : Replace values in a vector

## Parsing & Conversion

- [`na_as()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/na_as.md)
  :

  Return a `NA` value of the same type of an R object

- [`vector_to_c()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/vector_to_c.md)
  :

  Put a vector into [`c()`](https://rdrr.io/r/base/c.html)

## R Packages

- [`update_pkg_versions()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/update_pkg_versions.md)
  :

  Update package versions in the `DESCRIPTION` file

- [`update_pkg_year()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/update_pkg_year.md)
  : Update the year in system files of a package

## Scoping

- [`grab_fun_par()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/grab_fun_par.md)
  : Grab all the parameters in a function

## Strings

- [`extract_initials()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/extract_initials.md)
  : Extract initials from a character vector

## Statistics

- [`cohens_d()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/cohens_d.md)
  : Compute Cohen's d statistic
- [`cut_interval_mean()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/cut_interval_mean.md)
  : Compute the interval means of a cut factor
- [`mode()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/mode.md) :
  Find the most frequent value in a vector
- [`prop()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/prop.md) :
  Compute the proportion of values in a vector
- [`stats_summary()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/stats_summary.md)
  : Compute summary statistics
- [`std_error()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/std_error.md)
  : Compute the standard error of the sample mean
- [`test_outlier()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/test_outlier.md)
  : Test for outliers in a numeric vector
- [`remove_outliers()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/remove_outliers.md)
  : Remove outliers from a numeric vector

## System

- [`get_locale()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/get_locale.md)
  : Get the current locale settings
- [`set_en_us_locale()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/set_en_us_locale.md)
  : Set the system locale to English (United States)

## Vectors

- [`count_na()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/count_na.md)
  :

  Count the amount of `NA` values in a vector

- [`drop_na()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/drop_na.md)
  :

  Remove `NA` values from an atomic object

- [`inbetween_integers()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/inbetween_integers.md)
  : Get all the integers between two integers

## Zotero

- [`find_orphan_files()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/find_orphan_files.md)
  : Find orphan files in a Zotero library
- [`list_linked_files()`](https://danielvartan.github.io/rutils/reference/list_linked_files.md)
  : List all files linked to a reference in a Zotero library
